system.availability: +10 to Tech-Use, has six injectors of Sacred Ungents. Can blast censer chaff as Half Action once every 15 minutes, causes -5 to WS tests for  living creatures in 2 metres for one Round. +10 to detect user by smell unless censor is deactivated. Counts as Mono-knife
system.cost: Legally, limited to members of the Adeptus Mechanicus, requires relevent Mechadendrite Use Talent and Cyber-Mantle. May not have more Mechadendrites than Toughness Bonus
